name: copilot-scm-code-reviewer
description: A VS Code extension that sends SCM git diffs to GitHub Copilot Chat for code review.

enumDescriptions: Automatically select based on VS Code UI language
copilot-scm-code-reviewer.reviewLanguage.description: Language used for the review request sent to Copilot Chat. When set to "auto", the language is determined by the VS Code UI language.

copilot-scm-code-reviewer.reviewPrompt.j.description: Custom prompt for Japanese (ja). Use {{diff}} as a placeholder for the diff content. If {{diff}} is omitted, the diff is appended at the end. If empty, the built-in Japanese template is used.

copilot-scm-code-reviewer.reviewPrompt.e.description: Custom prompt for English (en). Use {{diff}} as a placeholder for the diff content. If {{diff}} is omitted, the diff is appended at the end. If empty, the built-in English template is used.
